The Evillious Chronicles:
EVILS THEATER Characters

Just before his death a solitary man created
That small theater deep in the forest.
—Heartbeat Clocktower

Characters residing in EVILS THEATER and associated with the Four Endings.

Master of the Court

法(ほう)廷(てい)の(の)主(ぬし)houtei no nushi

The awakened vessel of Sloth and the "doll director" of EVILS THEATER. She is represented by Hatsune Miku.

Gear

歯(は)車(ぐるま)haguruma

The awakened vessel of Greed and the Master of the Court's caretaker. He is represented by KAITO.

Master of the Graveyard

墓(はか)場(ば)の(の)主(あるじ)hakaba no aruji

One of the three phantoms awakened from the vessel of Gluttony along with the Servants. She is represented by MEIKO.

Servants

サーバンツSAABANTSU

Two of the three phantoms awakened from the vessel of Gluttony who serve the Master of the Graveyard. They are represented by Kagamine Rin & Len.

Waiter

待(ま)つ(つ)者(もの)matsu mono

The awakened vessel of Pride acting as the star of the theater. She is represented by Kagamine Rin.

Ma

Ma(エムエー)EMUEE

The first gardener and substitute for the unawakened vessel of Envy. She is represented by Megurine Luka.

Gammon Octo

ガモン＝オクトGAMON=OKUTO

The second gardener and substitute for the unawakened vessel of Lust. He is represented by Camui Gackpo.

Irregular

イレギュラーIREGYURAA

An unborn boy residing in the master of the court's womb. He is represented by Kagamine Len.

Master of the Hellish Yard

冥(めい)界(かい)の(の)主(ぬし)meikai no nushi

The woman who decides whether people are sent to Heaven or Hell. Members of EVILS THEATER believe she is in possession of the vessel of Wrath. She is represented by GUMI.
